titleStmt.title: The life and death of Griffin Flood informer Whose cunning courses, churlish manners, and troublesome informations, molested a number of plaine dealing people in this city of London. Wherein is also declared the murther of Iohn Chipperford Vinter, for twich fact the said Griffin Flood was pressed to death the 18. day of Ianuary last past.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by G. Eld] for I. T[rundle?] and are to be sold at the signe of the Bible without New-Gate [by J. Wright],

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from and publisher's and vendor's names conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Appears at reel 837 #2 and 1137 #6 (both British Library copy).
